FileOutputStream d;
		FileInputStream l;
		try {
			d = new FileOutputStream ("Discos.dat");
			l = new FileInputStream ("Discos.dat");
			ObjectOutputStream  discosArch=new ObjectOutputStream (d);
			ObjectInputStream lectura= new ObjectInputStream(l);
			discosArch.writeObject(disco1);
			Discos aux = (Discos)lectura.readObject();
			System.out.println(aux.cantante);
		} catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
